mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
mentionedBy.notes: Google Sheets debuted in 2006 as a free browser-based spreadsheet app with cloud collaboration built in. It offered a more user-friendly and accessible alternative to Excel, though with a limited feature set compared to desktop spreadsheet applications.

mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
mentionedBy.notes: Google Sheets remained a basic competitor for teams needing simple spreadsheet collaboration without advanced project management features, continuing to offer free browser-based access with cloud collaboration.
